alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:10PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of far southern Warrick, southwestern Spencer, northeastern Henderson and Daviess Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1009 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Newburgh, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stanley and Eureka around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Owensboro, Rockport and Grandview. This includes the following highways... Interstate 165 between Mile Markers 67 and 70. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 3 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
